verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* arrived, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H6223"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w number|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w ewe|strong="H3535"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w raised|strong="H1431"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* shared \w his|strong="H3605"\w* food \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w arms|strong="H2436"\w* \f + \fr 12:3 \ft Hebrew in his bosom; also in verse 8\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w traveler|strong="H1982"\w* came \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w*, \w who|strong="H6213"\w* refrained \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* own \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w traveler|strong="H1982"\w* \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H2550"\w* come \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3947"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w*’s \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* guest.”

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*: “\w As|strong="H6213"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w deserves|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w*!

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* \w shown|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* four times \w over|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* man! \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w*’s wives \w into|strong="H3063"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w arms|strong="H2436"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* if \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w even|strong="H3254"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* despised \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w command|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*? \w You|strong="H3947"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* Uriah \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w*, \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* despised \w Me|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wife \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Uriah \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*.’

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w adversity|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w Before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* very \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wives \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w broad|strong="H5869"\w* \w daylight|strong="H8121"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w broad|strong="H5048"\w* \w daylight|strong="H8121"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’” David’s Loss and Repentance

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.” “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*,” \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* replied. “\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w deed|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* shown utter contempt \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 12:14 \ft DSS; MT you have brought utter contempt from the enemies of the LORD\f* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w After|strong="H1004"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5062"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* Uriah’s wife \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* ill.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* pleaded \w with|strong="H7901"\w* God \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w*. \w He|strong="H1732"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* into \w his|strong="H1732"\w* house \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w spent|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* sackcloth \f + \fr 12:16 \ft DSS and LXX; MT does not include in sackcloth.\f* \w on|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* ground.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w anything|strong="H3899"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*? \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w whispering|strong="H3907"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w perceived|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* asked \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*?” “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ground, \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w anointed|strong="H5480"\w* \w himself|strong="H7812"\w*, \w changed|strong="H2498"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w into|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w request|strong="H7592"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* ate.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w While|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w but|strong="H4191"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* ate.”
